prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Disney World moves on from Skyliner accident, touts 1 million riders
Description: Disney announced in a new blog post that 1 million guests have been on its new Skyliner attraction   though neglected to mention a key incident.
Sure. I'd like to read that.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Celebs celebrate Halloween 2019
Description: Here's how the stars dressed up while celebrating Halloween this year!
I don't really care celeb culture much.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Central Arkansas vs. Duke Men's Basketball Highlights (2019-20)
Description: -
I don't enjoy sports.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Woman Falls Through Sidewalk Hole In Midtown
Description: CBS2's Ali Bauman has the latest on the woman who fell through a hole in the Manhattan sidewalk Friday afternoon.
I'd like the read that one.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Every 2019 Mid-Size Pickup Truck Ranked
Description: The smaller-than-full-size truck segment is growing fast. See which entrants are better than the rest.
I'm not a big car guy.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Berlin Freezes Rents in Landmark Plan to Tackle Cost Spiral
Description: Berlin's governing parties struck a deal to freeze rents for five years, marking one of the most radical plans to tackle spiraling housing costs in a major city and hitting the shares of major apartment owners.
Yes, I'd like to read that. I hope we get more policies like this here.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 'You've got to let them fight': Why Trump's advice doesn't work for kids
Description: Experts have some pretty clear ideas about how best to help kids who have a conflict to resolve, and why working through an issue is better than letting them fight it out at the playground.
What's the political bias of the article? I don't like reading right wing websites.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Make-A-Wish Colorado: 'Happy To Be A Shining Light In Olivia's Life'
Description: The Make-A-Wish Colorado Foundation spoke on camera for the first time since the mother of Olivia Gant was indicted of murder.
Wait what? I'd like to know what happened.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Alicia Keys Returns as GRAMMY Awards Host for a Second Time
Description: The singer hosted the 2019 ceremony in February.
Meh, I'm ambivilant.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: A Teenage Inventor May Have Solved the Problem of Car Blindspots
Description: Trying to see around a car pillar can be frustrating. Thanks to a Pennsylvania teen, we might not have to deal with it for much longer.
This sounds like it'll be disappointing.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Updated UFC Moscow Fight Card, ESPN+ Line Up
Description: With Junior dos Santos injured and unable to compete, controversial heavyweight slugger Greg Hardy will join the Moscow line up to battle Alexander Volkov in the new co-main event (full details here). The Zabit Magomedsharipov vs. Calvin Kattar featherweight showdown, meanwhile, is being promoted to event headliner, but will remain just three rounds because of the short notice.
I don't care.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: I'm Sorry, But Please Do Not Put Your Purse On My Couch
Description: Welcome to my house, please drop your bag right there.
Sounds like clickbait, I'll pass.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 30 Major Design Mistakes That Everyone Should Avoid

I also don't care for these sorts of articles.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Porsche Taycan Turbo S Sport Turismo runs hard at the 'Ring

Not into cars.

I want to read more.

I might read this.

Don't even know who that is, and I don't care.

Instead of the name of a combat sports sanctioning body or a wrestling organization, the belt was adorned with the letters "BMF." As a smiling Johnson strode through a partition in the crowd, ...

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Howell City weighing offer from developer to purchase 64-space downtown parking lot
Description: Okemos-based True North Development has offered the city $250,000 for a 64-parking lot downtown.
I really really really don't care.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: New York Times
Title: In Norway, the Electric Vehicle Future Has Already Arrived
Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: yes

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: TIME Magazine
Title: Two Coronations, 70 Years Apart
Description: The Visual Parallels Between Elizabeth II and Charles III's Coronations
evaluation_results.label: no

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: The Atlantic
Title: What Does Sentience Really Mean?
Description: The fact that AI isn’t alive doesn’t mean it can’t be sentient, the sociologist Jacy Reese Anthis argues.
evaluation_results.label: yes
evaluation_results.explanation: I want to see if this means actual artificial intelligence of shit like this dumb chat bot.
